name: nid
description: Nice clean-mouthed random id generation, without any swearing!

scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm i && npm test
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.repo-publish: npm run reset && npm run repo-tag && npm run prettier && npm test && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org

author: Richard Rodger (@rjrodger)
